title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set
OB: When attempting to create a new table group without setting the data set, an error is shown
EB: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set. Add a table report item without setting the data set and try to create a new table group. The user should be able to go and define a group, even if the dataset is not defined.
